title: How to manage subjects
description: Add, edit and remove a subject

body.raw:
# How to add or edit a subject

## Add a subject

1. Click on the **Add Subject** button.
2. Fill in the form.
3. Click on the **Save** button.
4. The subject will be added to the list.
5. Click on the **Edit** button to edit the subject.
6. Click on the **Delete** button to delete the subject.
7. Click on the **Back** button to go back to the list.
8. Click on the **Home** button to go back to the home page.
9. Click on the **Logout** button to logout.
10. Click on the **Help** button to go to the help page.
11. Click on the **Terms and Conditions** button to go to the terms and conditions page.
12. Click on the **Privacy Policy** button to go to the privacy policy page.
13. Click on the **Contact** button to go to the contact page.
14. Click on the **About** button to go to the about page.
15. Click on the **Add Subject** button to add a subject.
16. Click on the **Add Question** button to add a question.

![add-edit-a-subject](/blog/iphone-subjects-tutorial.png)
